name: HotelSpecials-Anywere
tag_list: hotel-specials, hotel-discounts, hotel-offers, hotel-promotions, hotel-deals, hotel-bargains, hotel-sales, hotel-coupons
overview: HotelSpecials-Anywhere.com is a one-stop solution to find hotel discounts and special offers at 28,000 hotels and resorts around the world. Promotions include long stay discounts, free nights, suite upgrades, resort coupons, early booking discount, excursion packages, and last minute deals. Feature is always Las Vegas hotels.

external_links.title: Finding Hotel Specials at Vacation Resorts
